content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #132

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Submitted by Ricardo Quintano Neira
Chapter/section: Subscription Request
Url: https://fhircast.hl7.org/specification/May2019Ballot/index.html
Type: A-S Clarification

Summary: Enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader

Comment: "When sending the content distribution request, the hub will make a POST request to the callback URL including any query string parameters in the URL portion of the request, not as POST body parameters"

What is "content distribution request"? I suggest to enhance the sentence to provide a better understanding from the reader.

Existing wording: When sending the content distribution request, the hub will make a POST request to the callback URL including any query string parameters in the URL portion of the request, not as POST body parameters.

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

NiklasSvenzen commented on Issue #132

Persuasive with mod

Existing wording: When sending the content distribution request, the hub will make a POST request to the callback URL including any query string parameters in the URL portion of the request, not as POST body parameters.

Proposed wording: When sending the event notifications, the hub will make a POST request to the callback URL including any query string parameters in the URL portion of the request, not as POST body parameters.

wmaethner commented on Issue #132:

## :landline: II Working Group Vote (6-18-2019)
Block vote

@isaacvetter moved the following disposition, seconded by Ricardo Quintano Neira

Disposition: Persuasive with mod
Disposition Comment: Will fix as described in the issue comments or by the commenter

:+1: For: 10
:expressionless: Abstain: 2
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
